_header: When in mine hand was taken me this patent
_description: Charles d’Orléans, a discussion on Love — twenty-one stanzas rhyme royal

BLHar682.First Lines:
When in myn hond was tan me þis patentI seide my lord o verry
                    god puysshaunt…
BLHar682.Last Lines:
…Forwhi good will hit may thi case preuayleFor which that y
                    bigan all this trauayle
